name: @datadog/native-iast-rewriter

0.1.0-beta.0.name: @datadog/native-iast-rewriter
0.1.0-beta.0.description: Datadog IAST instrumentation addon for NodeJS

scripts.build: napi build --platform --release && npm run artifacts:gyp
scripts.buildAndTest:debug: npm run build && npm run test:junit
scripts.buildAndTest:linux: npm run build:linux && npm run test:junit
scripts.buildAndTest:alpine: npm run build:alpine && npm run test:junit
scripts.buildAndTest:windows: npm run build:windows && npm run test:junit
scripts.buildAndTest:darwin: npm run build:darwin && npm run test:junit
scripts.buildAndTest:darwinArm: npm run build:darwinArm && npm run test:junit

0.1.0-beta.3.name: @datadog/native-iast-rewriter
0.1.0-beta.3.description: Datadog IAST instrumentation addon for NodeJS

scripts.build: napi build --platform --release && npm run artifacts:gyp
scripts.buildAndTest:debug: npm run build && npm run test:junit
scripts.buildAndTest:linux: npm run build:linux && npm run test:junit
scripts.buildAndTest:alpine: npm run build:alpine && npm run test:junit
scripts.buildAndTest:windows: npm run build:windows && npm run test:junit
scripts.buildAndTest:darwin: npm run build:darwin && npm run test:junit
scripts.buildAndTest:darwinArm: npm run build:darwinArm && npm run test:junit
scripts.test:junit: cross-env DD_LOCAL_VAR_NAME_HASH=test mocha --file 'test/setup.js' --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./build/junit.xml test/**/*.spec.js
scripts.test:integration: cross-env DD_LOCAL_VAR_NAME_HASH=test mocha --file 'integration-test/setup.js' --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./build/junit-integration.xml integration-test/**/*.spec.js
